Definition:
Write a fact related to the given fact, based on the given topic word. Note that, your fact should have at least one word in common with the given fact. All facts in this task refer to science facts. Your related fact must form a chain with the given fact. Chains form when two facts connect together to produce a third fact. An example of a chain is: "pesticides cause pollution" (given fact) + "pollution can harm animals" (related fact) â†’ "pesticides can harm animals" (connected chain)
Things to avoid: Avoid creating simple paraphrases of the given fact. While your generated fact should be related to the input fact, they must describe slightly different scientific phenomenon. 
Emphasis & Caution: It's okay if your related fact includes some irrelevant information, provided that it has some overlap with the given fact and it contains some words corresponding to the provided  topic.
